messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Due to your lackluster performance, and lack of filed paperwork sheet OH-28, we will be unable to supply the default emergency shuttle upon request.

Please enjoy your replacement.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
As a follow up, please bring radiation gear.

We thank you for your understanding.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Due to several clerical errors, we have sent you our ferry, with cargo aboard.

Please do not touch the cargo.

The ferry will return as soon as the situation is resolved.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Indrick Boreale. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.
